# apollo_apikey (Resource)

API key resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `graph_id` (String) the id of the graph that the key is for
- `key_name` (String) the name of the api key

### Read-Only

- `token` (String) the token of the key
